markdownRemark.html: This golf course is located in the north east of Almeria. It is an impressive golf course composed of 18 holes, par 70, of an extraordinary quality and has a large number of lakes, more than 100 strategically located bunkers and greens. This golf course is set in a spectacular setting with steep mountains that provide the backdrop. The course has a variety of tees that allow most of the criteria of golfers to enjoy their day.

frontmatter.title: Aguilón Golf

frontmatter.address: Urb.Mundo Aguilón Pilar de Jaravía, 04648 Pulpí, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 60.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 60.00 euros
